raw_output:
> mcp-gemini-adjudicator@0.1.0 test
> node test-server.mjs

✅ MCP Gemini Adjudicator Server Test
=====================================

📋 Server Configuration:
- Name: mcp-gemini-adjudicator
- Version: 0.1.0
- Transport: stdio

🛠️ Available Tools:
1. verify_with_gemini
   - Evaluates artifacts (code, answers, specs)
   - Returns structured JSON verdict
   - Optional Google Search grounding

2. consensus_check
   - Compares multiple model answers
   - Identifies agreements and conflicts
   - Optional triangulation with Gemini's answer

📝 Example Usage in Claude Desktop:
```json
{
  "mcpServers": {
    "gemini-adjudicator": {
      "command": "node",
      "args": [
        "/home/xanacan/Dropbox/code/mcp-gemini-adjudicator/index.mjs"
      ],
      "env": {
        "GEMINI_API_KEY": "YOUR_GOOGLE_AI_STUDIO_KEY",
        "GEMINI_MODEL": "gemini-2.0-flash-exp"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

✅ Server is ready for integration!
⚠️  Remember to set your GEMINI_API_KEY before using with real requests.
🔑 Get your API key from: https://aistudio.google.com/app/apikey
